reviews.author: Local Visitor
reviews.text: Feel-good atmosphere and super nice staff. Perfect place to relax and enjoy excellent coffee.

reviews.author: Coffee Enthusiast
reviews.text: Perfect homemade coffee in a family-run caffe. The raspberry cream roll and waffles are outstanding!

reviews.author: Berlin Regular
reviews.text: Best soft ice cream in the neighborhood! Great variety of teas and the atmosphere is so cozy and welcoming.
